sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include">
    <sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <access>package_private</access>
        <active>true</active>
        <api_name>global.WF_ClientDateTimeUtils</api_name>
        <caller_access/>
        <client_callable>true</client_callable>
        <description/>
        <name>WF_ClientDateTimeUtils</name>
        <script><![CDATA[var WF_ClientDateTimeUtils = Class.create();
WF_ClientDateTimeUtils.prototype = Object.extendsObject(AbstractAjaxProcessor, {
    getNowDateTimeDiff: function() {
        var duedt = this.getParameter('sysparm_duedt');
        var diffType = this.getParameter('sysparm_difftype');
        var diff = gs.dateDiff(gs.nowDateTime(), duedt, true);
        var timediff = this._calcDateDiff(diffType, diff);
        return timediff;
    },
    _calcDateDiff: function(diffTYPE, seconds) {
        var thisdiff;
        if (diffTYPE == "day") {
            thisdiff = seconds / 86400;
        } else if (diffTYPE == "hour") {
            thisdiff = seconds / 3600;
        } else if (diffTYPE == "minute") {
            thisdiff = seconds / 60;
        } else if (diffTYPE == "second") {
            thisdiff = seconds;
        } else {
            thisdiff = seconds;
        }
        return thisdiff;
    },
    type: 'WF_ClientDateTimeUtils'
});]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>U832938</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2023-04-18 11:01:23</sys_created_on>
        <sys_id>49a98d99db966d100e3f8e39139619d2</sys_id>
        <sys_mod_count>13</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_name>WF_ClientDateTimeUtils</sys_name>
        <sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package>
        <sys_policy/>
        <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope>
        <sys_update_name>sys_script_include_49a98d99db966d100e3f8e39139619d2</sys_update_name>
        <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by>
        <sys_updated_on>2024-02-04 17:24:13</sys_updated_on>
    </sys_script_include>
</record_update>
